LanguageData.ShowUmbrellasHelp: ☔ ENABLED: Umbrella graphics will be displayed when a pawn is actively using an umbrella to block weather or sunlight. ○ DISABLED: Umbrella graphics will never be displayed, but umbrellas will still block weather and sunlight. ↻ DEFAULT: enabled
LanguageData.UmbrellasBlockSunHelp: ☔ ENABLED: Umbrellas will block sunlight for pawns with sunlight sensitivity. ○ DISABLED: Umbrellas will not block sunlight. ↻ DEFAULT: enabled
LanguageData.UmbrellaClothingHelp: ☔ ENABLED: Activates support for weather-blocking clothing. By default, only the Cowboy Hat is supported, which blocks light rain only, and does not encumber. Mods may add additional weather-blocking clothing. ○ DISABLED: Deactivates support for weather-blocking clothing. ↻ DEFAULT: enabled
LanguageData.EncumberWork: Reduce work speed while using an umbrella:
LanguageData.EncumberWorkHelp: ☔ ENABLED: Pawn work speed -15% when using an umbrella. Applies only when an umbrella is actively deployed against weather or sunlight. ○ DISBALED: Pawns will not receive a work speed debuff. ↻ DEFAULT: enabled
LanguageData.EncumberCombat: Worse accuracy and aiming speed when using an umbrella:
LanguageData.EncumberCombatHelp: ☔ ENABLED: Pawn shoot accuracy -15% and aim delay +15% when using an umbrella. Applies only when an umbrella is actively deployed against weather or sunlight. ○ DISABLED: Pawns will not receive accuracy or aim delay debuffs. ↻ DEFAULT: enabled
